xat.config.title: Trinkets and Baubles
xat.exampletext.start: These are informational example text, they do not show up in game.
xat.exampletext.1: Tooltips for Items go up to 10
xat.exampletext.3:
There are 3 Compatability Texts per Item, examples are
xat.exampletext.4= item.item.glow_ring.0.compat.tan= For Tough as Nails
xat.exampletext.5= item.item.glow_ring.0.compat.firstaid= For First Aid
xat.exampletext.6= item.item.glow_ring.0.compat.enhancedvisuals= For EnhancedVisuals
xat.exampletext.7: There are Color Codes that can be used to give the text below colors in game
xat.exampletext.9: "strikethrough", "underline", "italic", "bold". Can also be used, Example: #strikethrough:, #bold:, etc.
xat.noattributes: This item doesn't give any attribute modifiers.

xat.config.client.render.entity.renderer: When using the Enchanted Race rings, should Trinkets and Baubles Replace the EntityRenderer to solve some of the camera clipping issues?
When the Trinket and Baubles custom EntityRenderer breaks certain settings with Optifine, specifically fog, use this to toggle fog for compatibility.
